name: The Cursed Island (RK Games Studio)
description:
Hi...!

I am developing a Zombie survival , Strategic , Battle royal game with a completely different style and logics. 

I am using Unity game engine for making this games.

Follow me on YouTube

Follow me on Facebook

Visit my game's page on Facebook

Game website

In this game , players can train their pets. Each pet will be having special abilities. Pets can be leveled up till level-10. Pets will help players to fight against enemies. Player can have one pet at a time.
The player can also level up their characters. Each level up will give you special abilities and superpowers.
Killing enemies will give players coins which can be used to redeem things.
Completing the story mode will unlock  the Tree of Heart

For more information related this game click here

Thank you for your visit😀 ❤ 

Share this to your family & friends 🙏 😊
